news.title: Coastal Erosion and Sea Level Rise Protection Measures
news.content: Kerala High Court mandates comprehensive coastal protection measures to address sea level rise and erosion, emphasizing sustainable coastal management and community relocation support.

news.title: Spices Trade Quality Standards and Farmer Protection
news.content: The court establishes quality standards for spices trade and ensures fair pricing for farmers in Kerala's spice industry, protecting against market exploitation.

news.title: Backwater Ecosystem Conservation Guidelines
news.content: Kerala High Court issues comprehensive guidelines for backwater ecosystem conservation, regulating tourism activities and protecting aquatic biodiversity.
